abstract: In one of the largest common stock offerings this year, Wells Fargo sold a greater-than-expected $11 billion of stock on Thursday evening to help fund its purchase of Wachovia.
lead_paragraph: In one of the largest common stock offerings this year, Wells Fargo sold a greater-than-expected $11 billion of stock on Thursday evening to help fund its purchase of Wachovia.

headline.main: Wells Sells $11 Billion in Stock for Wachovia Deal
